mapper.insert: insert into t04_live_culture ( culture_id, module_id, index_title, index_content, img_path, index_state, pub_state, order_by, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{culture_id}, #{module_id}, #{index_title}, #{index_content}, #{img_path}, #{index_state}, #{pub_state}, #{order_by}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select e.*,o.function_name from t04_live_culture e left join t01_function_info o on e.module_id = o.module_id
order by e.index_title
mapper.update: update t04_live_culture set index_state=1 ,pub_state=1 ,cre_time=now() ,upd_time=now() where culture_id = #{culture_id}
mapper.select: select e.index_title as title,e.img_path as img_url, e.index_content as content, e.order_by as oid from t04_live_culture e inner join ( select order_by,max(culture_id) as culture_id from t04_live_culture GROUP BY order_by ) a on e.culture_id =a.culture_id where e.index_state=1 and e.pub_state=1
select index_title as title,img_path as img_url, index_content as content from t04_live_culture where index_state=1 and pub_state=1 and order_by=#{id}
